mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, GENDER, JOINDATE, USERACCOUNT, ADDRESSNAME, ADDRESSPHONE, POSTALCODE, ADDRESSDETAIL) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, SYSDATE, 1, #{addressName}, #{addressPhone}, #{postalCode}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME FROM USERS WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
